function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of sufficient understanding to design a high-quality community","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate fairness, accessibility, and optimization of supply allocation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multisource data, arcgis, and una for community planning","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The impact of virtual space on traditional lifestyles and spatial organization of society","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual information networks undermining physical transportation networks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 accelerating the impact of virtual space on residents’ lifestyles and causing changes in the use of community service facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of non-contact interaction on urban space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on non-contact interaction activities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakening of geographic distance due to technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reconfiguration of urban space due to technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dependence on the internet due to covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of ’non-contact’ interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid growth of internet users in china","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of lifestyle changes before, during, and after covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of non-contact interaction applications for urban community development","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of non-contact interactions in community planning","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reshaping of community lifestyles in the post-pandemic period","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importance of community-based spatial unit","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community life circle planning model","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage samples from a hospital","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in the study, including small sample size and lack of air sampling for sars-cov-2 rna detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on object surfaces in a hospital isolation ward","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive stool specimen for sars-cov-2 rna in patient with mechanical ventilation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High hand hygiene compliance of staff and effectiveness of disinfection measures in isolation wards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection and cleaning of hospital equipment and surfaces may lead to the transmission of sars-cov-2 and other infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of general hospital wards into temporary isolation wards may lead to concerns about infection control and environmental safety","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Generation of respiratory aerosols from medical ventilators increases the risk of occupationally acquired infection among healthcare personnel","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sewage samples positive for sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination in field-settings with sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rt-pcr testing for sars-cov-2 virus detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus isolation and culture in biosafety level 3 bsl-3 laboratory","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in isolation ward environment and staff ppe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of indoor air and surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and testing of patient and staff samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete environmental sampling and ppe site sampling","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of hospital environment with sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact and droplet secretions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pathogen contamination in the hospital environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on hospital surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support from who in 2003","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of uncontrolled mass travel during holidays","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate case identification, containment, and resource allocation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficult decisions under uncertainty and time constraints","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear health messaging","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time public communications mostly in mandarin chinese and sign language, limited communication in different languages for non-taiwanese citizens","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Permitting the docking of the diamond princess cruise ship with confirmed infections onboard, leading to public panic and concern about community spread","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the sustainability of intensive public health policies and public reception until the end of the epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
